tweet: It was my honor to present Herschel Feigelson with the Purple Heart. Despite being shot, he helped fellow wounded soldiers reach safety during the Korean War. My office got his award after a bureaucratic issue delayed it. A grateful nation is thankful for his service & sacrifice. pic.twitter.com/ojlBdmrVXQ

Get ready for Team Davis in Lemon Grove! Have a question or need help with a federal agency? Then come down to my Office Hours. My staff will be on hand to answer your questions and see if we can help. pic.twitter.com/RapHk98rVs

I just voted to demand that President Trump make the Mueller Report public. The American people have the right to see what is in the report. It was their democracy that was attacked.

Congressional interns should be paid for their hard work. It's the right thing to do and my office does it. President Trump’s ban is an attack on the thousands of #transgender patriots who are serving their country courageously. It's based solely on prejudice & bigotry. I'll continue to take steps to reverse this policy of discrimination that undermines our values & military readiness.

Dreamers, TPS, and DED holders contribute every day to our communities and our nation. They are teachers, students, medical professionals, first responders, entrepreneurs, and taxpayers. And they deserve the certainty the Dream and Promise Act will provide. #ProtectTheDream

Every woman has the right to live free from abuse. A budget must reflect the values of our nation. #ForThePeople Act expands voting rights, ends gerrymandering, and cracks down on corruption.
